titleStmt.title: The messenger of an universal peace: or a third message to the Philadelphian Society. By J. Lead
titleStmt.author: Lead, Jane, 1623-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for the booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: Wing reports title as "A messenger of an universal peace."
Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
